page.title: 02EDUCATION:GENERAL POINTS
page.content: There are 5 primary schools serving the whole of the Ffestiniog area. Just off our grid at 68-44 is our own Tanygrisiau Primary School -winners of the PRINCE OF WALES AWARD(l983) and the BRITISH SCHOOLS CURRICULUM AWARD (1984) for establishing a School and Area Museum. NO. on roll:34. Glanypwll Primary :68pupils; Maenofferen Primary:350; Manod Primary: 91 and Ffestiniog's BRO CYNFAL (re-named this year):63 Lessons are according to Gwynedd C.C.'s directive on Bilingual Education but stress is placed on acquiring the Welsh language from an early age. Pupils are accepted from the age of 4. At ll they are transferred to YSGOL Y MOELWYN Comprehensive School. The annual area primary sports are held in July.
